titleStmt.title: The traveller's song; or, Pleasant meditations on the way. By George Liddell, in Edinburgh.
titleStmt.author: Liddell, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by Thomas Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: With citations of relevant Bible verses in margins.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
